core

Class CBot

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.CBot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    bwapi.BWEventListener

    public class CBot
extends java.lang.Object
implements bwapi.BWEventListener
    CBot.java --- The Bot-class itself of which an instance gets created. This class receives all events from the BWAPI-Eventlistener.
    Author:
    P H - 18.03.2017

      • addToThreadFinishing

        public void addToThreadFinishing(java.lang.Thread thread)
        Function for adding a Thread to the pool of Threads that must be waited for when the game ends.
        Parameters:
        thread - the Thread that must be waited for.

      • removeFromThreadFinishing

        public void removeFromThreadFinishing(java.lang.Thread thread)
        Function for removing a Thread from the pool of Threads that must be waited for when the game ends.
        Parameters:
        thread - the Thread that is going to be removed.

      • waitForAllThreads

        public void waitForAllThreads()
        Function for waiting for all stored Threads to finish. Causes the main Thread to pause until all Threads are terminated.
